lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in so many ways I cannot refuse to share these things with those who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Spanish, philosophy, and sciences. I hope to eventually attend medical school but my more short term goals include traveling the world, learning new languages, and serving people!

lenders.name: Kory
lenders.loan_because: I believe in what goes around comes around; I believe we can all work together to make the world a better place for everyone in it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a daycare director in an isolated community. I oversee staff that cares for children ages 0-6 years old.

lenders.name: Anne & Kathy
lenders.loan_because: our spare change can change lives, and we are happy to share it.

lenders.name: The Vandergrift Team
lenders.loan_because: One of our Team values is to give freely of our time, talent and treasure.  Thank you for providing us with this opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Each and every one of us on our team has a deep desire to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: My life is full of so many blessings, I want to give to those where and when I can. We are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to love what I do and by being myself on television it helps to convey that being yourself is a blessing in itself.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I want to support Entrepreneurs in developing countries as well as those in high tech.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with high tech start up companies and Entrepreneurs in the western US.

lenders.name: Primelia
lenders.loan_because: **dreams are for everyone**
lenders.occupational_info: **sharing memories from the past**

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.occupation: Military Wife, USO Volunteer, small business owner

lenders.occupational_info: I am a military wife, a USO full time Volunteer, and small business owner.

lenders.name: Debbie Zipp
lenders.loan_because: it is a very important part of living a significant life.  I think the concept behind KIVA is a brilliant way to give.  You are giving the gift of empowerment.  You are giving the gift of making a dream come true.  What could be better!
lenders.occupational_info: My main focus right now is producing films that celebrate the power of women over 40. My production company, my website and it's short films are dedicated to empowering women over 40  but I believe it also resonates with all women.

lenders.name: Jacques
lenders.loan_because: "No man is so poor as to have nothing worth giving. Give what you have. To someone it may be better than you dare to think." - - Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because this is a small way for me to help others around the world while I am in school studying to become a teacher and hoping to create positive change.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I've been around the world and seen great poverty.  This is a simple way I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I write specifications for clothing.  I work with factories to get samples that we will review for construction/fit and approve to get production started.  I also go to the factories to review the garments in production.

lenders.name: Fawn
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to help where I know exactly to whom my money is going to.
lenders.occupational_info: Science research for books.

lenders.name: keeley
lenders.loan_because: as a canadian citizen, i am one of the luckiest women on earth. In order to honour this, I am obligated to participate in the global community, and help create a better world than we live in today.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. Helping others makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my days taking care of my home and family. I organize finances, cook, clean, shop, and drive my children to their activities.

lenders.name: Yvette
lenders.loan_because: I experience the blessings of abundance in my own life.
lenders.occupational_info: The greater good, always.

lenders.name: Daniel

lenders.occupational_info: I am an Emergency Medical Technician for the US Army.  We live in New Mexico, but are from Orange County, CA.

lenders.name: Chef Doug

lenders.occupational_info: My work revolves around Internet technologies, their implementation and scalability.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because:

What this organization does is both logical and brilliant at the same time.
What an inspiring and meaningfull way to make a difference and see the results.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a transportation broker or in simpler terms an intermediary between customers who need their products moved and the trucking companies that are looking for the loads.

lenders.name: Holly

lenders.name: Ann B

lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Corky

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a voice actor for radio and tv.  I am one of those big voices that you hear, but never see on commercials and documentary films.

lenders.name: Sonia
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I encourage and empower people to change their lives through education.

lenders.name: Kris & Random
lenders.loan_because: These entrepreneurs are inspiring!
lenders.occupational_info: Random is a High School History Teacher and Kris works in business in the healthcare technology field.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I started as a Kiva translator and just wanted to get more involved
lenders.occupational_info: accountant

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to know I can help even though I am so far away.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: it's fun!
lenders.occupational_info: I recruit for finance and accounting jobs in the Los Angeles area.

lenders.name: Cherie
lenders.loan_because: Hopefully this will have a ripple effect and help to empower and foster entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate special events and programs for corporations.

lenders.name: Tuppy
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate to be living in Canada and I want to help people.  In a very small way, this is my way of being able to give back and hope to be able to do more.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Consumer Marketing Manager for Sportsnet magazine - a recently launched bi-weekly sports magazine in Canada.

lenders.name: Tedesco Family Vancouver
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to empower people.

lenders.name: Claire et Greg
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher for one of us  (Greg) and librarian for the other one (Claire).

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Judith Chapman
lenders.loan_because: Kiva has made it possible.
lenders.occupational_info: The stars of Daytime TV and Happy Hour Productions performed "The Trial of the Catonsville 9."  They gave of their time and donated all of the money raised from tickets sold to Kiva.  For more about the play, go to judithchapman.com.

lenders.name: Lynette
lenders.loan_because: I have the means to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I help get stories in the newspaper and on television and radio.

lenders.name: Joachim
lenders.loan_because: The more you help the more you get!! God bless Kiva!!

lenders.name: subsketch
lenders.loan_because: After extensive travel in Europe, Asia and the South Pacific I have realised many existing institutions are failing to support small and local initiatives...I also know we need a blend of solutions and to work creatively to allow new institutions to be formed that will help us develop further...along side this a new way of valueing resources shall be required, but thats another story...
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a storyteller...

and a future project will enable you to tell more stories to those where you live.

lenders.name: Binal & Brijesh
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at life and not everyone is born with the resources that many of us have.  As more people help others to give hope, the better this world will become overtime.

lenders.name: Kacia
lenders.loan_because: Did you know that experts agree that the world does in fact produce enough food for everyone on the planet?! Some where along the way we have not properly distributed what we have been charged to take care of. Let's even things out a bit, shall we?:)
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of people.

lenders.name: Mary and Barry
lenders.loan_because: I believe!
lenders.occupational_info: We build and sell houses.

lenders.name: Cliff
lenders.loan_because: It seems like an incredibly easy way to help someone in the developing world improve their lives.  We have such privilege in this country, it is eye-opening how much $25 means for someone in Nigeria.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I think everybody deserves a better life, and it is a pleasure to help in a small way. I hope I can do this over and over for a long time.Good luck to all involved!
lenders.occupational_info: Through play, in the home of an imaginary wacky scientist, I teach people from 1-103 how to do simple experiments and learn something new every day. A very satisfying job....

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: giving people a chance to be better allows them a chance to offer others a chance to be better-
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a public school teacher for 30 years

lenders.name: Chris and Jill
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the common spirit of humanity, and the idea of self reliance. I believe in Jesus Christ.
lenders.occupational_info: As a distributor of MonaVie I spread the message of better health and the opportunity of personal wealth through MonaVie. I intend to utilize the wealth obtained through MonaVie to fund additional loans with Kiva!

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life. If I have the ability to help someone then it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that the telephones in our company work - every day - all day. We have almost 10,000 employees world wide.

lenders.name: Per & Tim
lenders.loan_because: we wish to make a difference in someones life.
lenders.occupational_info:
Per is the chief conservator at a midsize museum where he cares for a cultural heritage collection.
Tim is an independent contractor for large companies, where he helps his team to grow and succeed.

lenders.name: Elisabeth & Family
lenders.loan_because: This is a family thing. We pick out the loans together. We think that the loans we make through Kiva may be the best thing we ever do. It's made it so easy to "reach out and touch someone". We travel the world and meet people like the Kiva entrepreneurs all the time. But we were never able to fund whole projects on our own. This has made it possible. Thanks, Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: My husband works to make it impossible for someone to steal your identity with a computer, I pay the bills for a bunch of people who help the homeless and people looking for a job, and my daughter is in high school and volunteers at our local library.

lenders.name: Shad B
lenders.loan_because: Microcredit is one of the most efficient and direct ways of helping people in developing countries improve their lives.   I want to do my small part to help make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Andi
lenders.occupational_info: Human Services

lenders.name: mccardey
lenders.loan_because: KIVA makes it so easy :)
lenders.occupational_info: writer

lenders.name: Gwen & Gene
lenders.loan_because: We care. We want to help others to be able to provide for their families. We are blessed and we want to pay it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: We help people start their own homebased business in the U.S. and 13 other countries.

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: I care about the developing world and I know exactly how I am helping. Thanks KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: Mathematician

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.occupational_info: I teach High School

lenders.name: ESEM.SK
lenders.loan_because: let's make the world better
lenders.occupational_info: e-commerce

lenders.name: Susanna
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born in a prosperous, wealthy nation.  God has blessed me with an abundance, and it is my duty to share what resources I have with those who have less.  I believe that Kiva's loans can do great things because the money initially offered will help expand a business and better a life.  When the loan is repaid, those same funds can be used again to help others.  I hope that through this website I can maximize the benefit of what I have to give.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help others achieve their dreams, or just have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: Work in Enrollment Office for Youth Programs (camps) and Adult Adventure programs.

lenders.name: Aia
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: chisara
lenders.loan_because: Don't feed me fish for one day; teach me how to fish and I will feed my self for many a day! I LOVE that saying and its philosophy has guided me throughout my life. I am self-employed and I admire those who strive to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I defend the down-trodden in courts. I fight for the rights of those who have been wrongly injured. I am an employment law and civil rights attorney. I derive great satisfaction in leveling the playing field!

lenders.name: Globe Runners
lenders.loan_because:
我們都是一家人。 有能力就幫忙。

Life is hard for many children around the world.  We are grateful that we have the opportunity to make their lives easier in some way.

"Comenzar juntos es el Principio.
Mantenerse juntos es el Progreso.
Trabajar juntos es el Exito."

Viva la comunidad solidaria!

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves . . .

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Billy
lenders.occupation: Director, EKU Center for Environmental Education
lenders.occupational_info: I work to educate teachers how to use the environment to teach in all subject areas.

lenders.name: Sim Yoe
lenders.loan_because: Give someone in need a hand, to let them stand up and live with dignity is one of my goals in life.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I try and help companies become more efficient and save money.

lenders.name: Shelli
lenders.loan_because: I'd like for others to acheive their dreams as I have been fortunate in acheiving many of mine.
lenders.occupational_info: My counseling practice offers support, guidance  and relief to clients who have life struggles/problems.  My specialization is working with survivors of trauma, particularly domestic abuse.

lenders.name: Arwen
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to live a happy , healthy life and I think everyone should have the right to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a performer based in San Francisco, California.  I act, sing, dance and do aerial circus.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people and sometimes the problems of the world seem too big for one person, but with these loans anyone can make a contribution and change the world.

lenders.name: The Cookson Family
lenders.loan_because: responsible credit is the fuel for economic development.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring people and expertise together to create value.

lenders.name: Carmen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.  I like KIVA because it helps people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I design software for business applications.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I care.  I feel that what goes around comes around.  I would want someone to help me if I needed it.  The Golden Rule.."Treat Others the Way You Want to be Treated".  Wouldn't this world be a different place if everyone obeyed this rule?
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sixth grade teacher in a Catholic school.  I share with  my students the importance of caring for our fellow human beings.  We are responsible for each other.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: What is a non-fat latte for me, may be a life changing opportunity for another. It's all relative. Money. Happiness. Freedom. Peace. All of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer. I design logos, brochures, magazines and websites.

lenders.name: Bill and Kathy
lenders.loan_because: We want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an automotive finance and insurance consulting firm and Kathy works for a home builder.

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: I have been very lucky in my life and would like to help people that did not have the advantages I did.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired high school automotive mechanics teacher.

lenders.name: c-stuff.com
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea of chanelling some of what we earn to development, and to helping other entrepreneurs. We will loan 3% of our revenue from each internet sale.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling computer and office supplies.

lenders.name: Billie
lenders.loan_because: I care.  I want to be a good example, and practice what I preach!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professor of art history, and I teach about the art and cultures of Africa, Oceania, and the Native cultures of the Americas.  I want my students to learn respect for other people and their cultures, and to care about others.

lenders.name: Lanre
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do ,and most especially to help our fellow human beings in many third world countries  who  are not as fortunate  as those of us living in the USA and other industrialized countries.
lenders.occupational_info: My work in the Military is exteremely hectic,  but I love  my job and  and the discipline  and most especially my current job  enables to travels to different part of the world.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I have a hart.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to fulfill a dream and create stability for those they love.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large telecommunications company, and am responsible for the company's charitable donations in the community.  I plan community events, and serve as my company's spokesperson in the media.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate and want to share my fortune with others. I think Kiva is a unique opportunity to reach out to people in a more personal way.

lenders.name: Alyson
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone take the next step in their life
lenders.occupational_info: I design buildings

lenders.name: Lynx
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should.

lenders.name: rocio
lenders.loan_because: God is good!

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: if we can't help one another then why are we here?!

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I like to try to help those in less developed and fortunate countries than ours. We genuinely consider ourselves to be lucky to have been born into a relatively comfortable 1st world environment and firmly believe in the 'pay it forward' philosophy. Just glad we can do something, no matter how small and insignificant to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Optimistic about the future

lenders.name: Debra and Chris
lenders.loan_because: We have been supported by many people and institutions throughout our working life, and we want to give back to people in other parts of the world who are striving to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: Debra teaches Spanish and Chris teaches Religious Studies at the College level.

lenders.name: Margo
lenders.loan_because: I just love helping people.  I have had so many wonderful people in my life and I would like to make someone as happy as I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my youngest daughter who is 12. I volunteer in art education.  II work on projects in my community to bring art to the public.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.occupation: booking agent and business school student

lenders.name: Ann and Henry
lenders.loan_because: We feel it is important for everyone to do what they can to help others.

lenders.name: Margaret Z.
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I had 4 children and worked hard in the home to see they had good nutrition, good habits, clothing that was clean and that they were respectful and kind to the people around them.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with much and want to bless others in the same way.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It feels good. It feels right.
lenders.occupational_info: Using a computer, I put all the elements together (music, dialog and picture) to make a television show.

lenders.name: joe
lenders.loan_because: helps somebody out...doesn't hurt me...makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly in a KC-135 and refuel military aircraft in all conditions in-flight

lenders.name: LORI
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate to have a wonderful family and a wonderful life. I would like to help someone improve their life if possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer in my community especially with youth organizations and animals.

lenders.name: Ioannis
lenders.loan_because: It is nice to help and give to other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I contact research and develop mathematical software that help people make better decisions.

lenders.name: Lynette
lenders.occupational_info: I write stories and books about women.

lenders.name: Kavita
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: Support services manager for a bankruptcy software company

lenders.name: Kathryn & John
lenders.loan_because: Other people have loaned to us when we wanted to do more for ourselves.  We want to pass on those blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: We raise horses and John installs plumbing into homes.  Kathy works in an office taking care of other people's money.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: these causes matter. Kiva provides long-term solutions not a 'hand out.'
lenders.occupational_info: I help children learn and prepare for their future.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: Loaning to those in need (particularly working people in poverty) around the globe makes a positive impact on us all.  It also sets a good example for my daughter who I would like to see grow up with experiences that don't all revolve around myspace.com, cell phones or fashion.  Lastly, there is nothing more satisfying in life than helping others to fulfill a goal or realize a dream!
lenders.occupational_info: My most important job is raising my one-year old daughter with my husband.  I started my own real estate firm when I was pregnant that allows me the flexibility both to raise her and to maintain a career path while helping to support my family.    Besides, I love assisting people who are buying or selling a home!

lenders.name: Rosario Chico
lenders.loan_because: In life do what matters and what is most important to you...important enough to make you happy and not question why you are doing it. I am a dreamer. I love enthusiastic people who are self-motivated and strive to create a change in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a film and broadcast major at Stephens College In Columbia, MO (United States). Stephens is an all women college. I want to create films that will contribute to this world in a positive manner. I want to help educate the world that there is purpose past our own life. Somewhere out there is a person in need, a person with desires, a person that can not do it all on their own, and it is up to those most fortunate to create a change in the lives of these people.

lenders.name: Cassaundra
lenders.loan_because: By loaning, I am helping someone potentially improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: At the moment, my only job is to learn. I am a college freshmen, meaning this is my first year at college.

lenders.name: Kimiko
lenders.loan_because: This is really great and fantastic idea to helping people to be  financialy independent and improve their  life standard!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm  Japanese who is working at the  private high  school in Singapore as school nurse.  My husband working at  the clinic as MD and we have two daughters.I have been living in south east Asia for nearly 19yrs. I wanted to do something to help   people but I didn't know how , but I found this now. I'm really looking forward to hearing from my lenders how they are trying to expand  thier business.

lenders.name: Carola
lenders.loan_because: I think loaning is to give trust, which is defenitely worth more than paying off your bad conscience.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for companies and newspapers in the Netherlands

lenders.name: Scott & Carmel
lenders.loan_because: You never miss a small amount but itmakes a big difference to others less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: We grow Wheat, Barley and Canola with Prime lambs on 3500 acre family farm near Willaura in West Victoria, rainfall 500mm year. We have three children, Archie, Maevie and Alfie.

lenders.name: Coach Bay
lenders.loan_because: I believe that each life matters, and we all have a role to play. I work on changing lives in the Global Village - one life at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I coach people to help them become the best they can be. Explore their potential and assist them  to make a difference.

lenders.name: 2 Sweet Boys
lenders.loan_because:
March 8, 2010-It is amazing to see that our original investment of $75 could help so many people. We donated our birthday money to Kiva. We are just going to keep re-lending it for as long as  Kiva exists to re-lend it on.  10 people and counting....

Sept 19, 2007-We want to help others.  It is so easy to reach out and help someone.  We are giving  Kiva gift certificates for Christmas, so that our friends can help too.

lenders.name: Richard & Jacqui
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for my salvation through the Lord Jesus Christ.
lenders.occupational_info: I watch for bad guys and try to catch them before they do bad things.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I built my businesses up from scratch an know how tough it can be even when resources are available.. I LOVE to help other people realize or maintain the dream of independence and self sufficiency. Especially those in areas where funds are less accessible.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business owner of retail and construction businesses. I am also a regular volunteer for agencies in my area that work with refugees.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: In honor of my mother, Mary, who passed away 9/20/06 and as a way to put my money to good use somewhere in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing for a large credit union in Northeast Florida

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: If I can make a loan, it doesn't make sense not to.  Why shouldn't we help each other?  Plenty of people have helped me.  It fills my soul, so thank you for the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a Master of Fine Arts.  I paint, teach all ages, and create shows of artwork.

lenders.name: Francine
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people in any capacity I can.  If many donate, loan, or give a little, it generates abundance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, for now.  I used to work at a world renown cancer hospital as a medical transcriptionist.

lenders.name: Arel Moodie
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone who is doing good deserves a chance to make it.  We can all lift as we climb.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel to colleges and organizations teaching students how to better their leadership skills and success rate while using the entrepreneurship mindset

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed time to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I cook and bake ,buy and sell things

lenders.name: Maraika
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is the future
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer!

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve in the United States Air Force.  I am a computer operator.

lenders.name: shiho
lenders.loan_because: I would like to do something helpful for neighbors who have a difficulty.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I live in a part of the world where I have everythings I need and more, why not give to the people in the world who don't have everything that they need.

lenders.name: Karl
lenders.loan_because: it's a very effective way to make a positive difference in the world. You can see results, it's easy to do, and what seems like a little money to us can make a big difference to someone else. It's also great to be able to leverage the power of many people coming together to help out, and Kiva does that brilliantly.
lenders.occupational_info: For fun I write and perform music, but to earn a living I do research into how people search for information on the internet.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: We are so fortunate that I would like to be able to help someone else.

lenders.name: PETER
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get loans to develop a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I renovate houses for rental or re-sale

lenders.name: Cedric
lenders.loan_because: I saw it on Oprah and it seems to be a great program,.
lenders.occupational_info:
Title: Assistant Director of Strategic Marketing and Partnerships

•Construct and present marketing proposals and solicit promotional partnerships
•Come up with creative marketing ideas
•Manage revenue generating partnerships

lenders.name: Beth & Tim
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is better to give a "hand up" rather than a "hand out."
lenders.occupational_info: Beth is a student studying to be a wildlife biologist. Tim builds and operates large astronomical telescopes.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell used and rare books.

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone fulfill their dreams and needs in building and growing their business.  Indirectly, I am able to impact other people who buy from them.
lenders.occupational_info: As an IT project manager, I plan and manage endeavors that result in some product or service, usually software that will allow people to get their information in an easier and more timely manner.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I am fortunate enough to have had people help me get to where I am in life and I am now able to continue the cycle and help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an owner of a small company that writes software which helps newspapers and magazines create their printed materials more efficiently.

lenders.name: Leilani
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed through the years with people helping me and I just want to pay it forward
lenders.occupational_info: I create and design advertising pieces for commercial use.

lenders.name: Bernadette
lenders.loan_because: I know the meaning of hardship and poverty - and I will never forget that. My life is much better now than when I was growing up - and I wish that what little I can offer can make a difference to someone.  I pray that someday I can do more.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need to become successful businessmen and women
lenders.occupational_info: For 30 years I taught music to children between the ages of 10 to 18. Many have become music teachers like me.

lenders.name: Jenni
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is a powerful tool for positive social transformation.

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand from time to time.

lenders.name: Marianne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are trying to better themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach elementary and middle school students how to use the computer.

lenders.name: Winter
lenders.loan_because: I would hope someone would do the same for me. No greater gift is needed more then love!

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: I'm looking for ways to show my appreciation for being born in a developed country with plenty of opportunities.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others grow their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell medical products to physicians.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to prosper in life.

lenders.name: Adriane, Edney, Pup Eli
lenders.loan_because: We lost everything in a fire and  it is so hard to rebuild.  Just another way to feel the gratefullness of what we have.  People are constantly helping us and I always believe in "pay it forward"
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people find clothes to travel around to different countries for leisure and volunteering including insect protection and sun protection clothing
